text: Edward Philip George Seaga ( or ; ON, PC; 28 May 1930 - 28 May 2019) was a Jamaican politician. He was the fifth Prime Minister of Jamaica, from 1980 to 1989, and the leader of the Jamaica Labour Party from 1974 to 2005."Profile: Edward Seaga", BBC; retrieved 8 April 2012. He served as leader of the opposition from 1974 to 1980, and again from 1989 until January 2005. Seaga died on 28 May 2019 at a hospital in Miami, Florida from cancer on his 89th birthday. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Florida Category:Prime ministers of Jamaica Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Politicians from Boston
title: Edward Seaga
